column4: http://mxhaard.free.fr/index.html might help - it supports the model no. ending with 23
according to your post your model number ends in 21. they tested the one ending in 23 and it worked. so yours might (they haven't been able to test it yet)
according to this, it will work: http://www.qbik.ch/usb/devices/showdev.php?id=3506
